attributes.action: Make it a criminal offence to sell halal/kosher food to anyone without a need
attributes.additional_details:
However, in the UK, many restaurants and manufacturers are defaulting to this food, as it is cheaper than providing options.
This is not in the spirit of the law and many people of other religions, including Christians (the majority religion in the UK), have requirements not to eat food blessed before other gods. As halal and kosher foods are blessed before the respective gods of those religions, which means that they should not be eating it. Often they are not even notified that they are eating such food.
attributes.background: Under current UK legislation, there is a requirement for halal and kosher food to be available to those to whom it is a requirement. The law also states that this food is to be solely for the consumption of the people of those religions.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure what you mean by "need".

Religious slaughter rules already state that the meat must be intended for followers of the religion concerned:

https://www.parliament.uk/business/publications/written-questions-answers-statements/written-question/Commons/2018-03-20/133445/

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/halal-and-kosher-slaughter

You might like to sign this petition instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/215241
